top_comments_top.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*

Okay, y'all can rail at this person all you want. But they are not running for office, and they are saying they're voting for the Democrat, because they no longer believe in the gop. I like it when people wake up.
I went to vote yesterday and was blown away by how many people were queued on a Friday in an off-year election. Here's hoping VA can stay blue, it's done some great things for us imo.

what gets me is the GOP is running, once again about the gov getting between parents and in this case schools, last time it was doctors.

but all my life its been republicans burning books, demanding books not be taught or taken out of class.. and its only by the grace of the supreme court that any school in the south teaches evolution.

You know the party that edited the textbooks in texas to downplay slavery and thomas jeffersons contribution to the US.

Liberals arent doing that. Liberals arent actually pushing schools to do squat. Liberals are just getting out the way of teachers.

we dont demand they teach liberal economic theory or try to erase republicans from history. But the right sure is.

you know the party that is currently getting in between people and medical professionals.

I left the GOP this year and changed my voting registration to Democrat. I can no longer in good conscience support the GOP as its changed to a party of hate and conspiracy that wants to install a dictator. I honestly don't see myself as a Democrat but I am definitely not what the Republicans are now.
